title: Dracula, the Reemergence of Vlad
description: Dracula... there have been a few changes since the book by that Stoker fellow. He's watched his image besmirched by the media and with the advent of certain technologies has even begun to experience a raw, and an almost alien new sensation, fear for the future. Dracula, The Reemergence of Vlad! A movie in book form dealing with the enduring legend himself! He's decided on the radical step of reintroducing himself to the world via Hollywood and the magic of movies. This time however, it will be his movie... but more importantly, his way!
author: Richard Reich
